ygData.subject: RE: Dwarven Cleric
ygData.msgSnippet: there are a few by the docks in BB that spawn quickly, provide good exp(around 30ish level), and drop an axe worth about 20 pp every time....and there is no
ygData.messageBody:
there are a few by the docks in BB that spawn quickly, provide good
exp(around 30ish level), and drop an axe worth about 20 pp every
time....and there is no faction hit

>From: "Curtis Bennett" <die_kluge@...>
>

>
